text: Nɨb nepɨm, nɨbi ned mab olip be okok ñɨn kɨd ogɨnap tek yebek okok, God nɨbop dad amɨl, mab olip teplep day ak bɨnɨg ñɨl, nag lɨl tɨbɨkup. Pen mab olip teplep anɨb ak, mab nɨbi ke mel. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl apun. Mab olip ñɨn kɨd nedil okok, God kɨlop tepayaŋ dad amɨl, mab olip teplep day ak bɨnɨg ñɨl, nag lɨl tɨbɨkɨnɨmuŋ tek lɨnɨgab. God ne koslam gep tek mel, gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup.
